name: @tef-novum/webview-bridge
description: JavaScript library to access to native functionality. Requires a webview with a postMessage bridge.

scripts.build: del dist && rollup -c && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/webview-bridge-umd.min.js dist/webview-bridge-umd.js && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/webview-bridge-iife.min.js dist/webview-bridge-iife.js && cpx ./src/webview-bridge-cjs.js.flow ./dist
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm test && npm run build

author: appscore@tuenti.com
